items.title: My dogs are my children. I already have a grief plan in place for when they die
items.summary: Dr Anupam Sharma doesn't want a partner or children. Pets are her life, and as a veterinarian and veterinary doula, she prepares us for life without them.

items.title: No, you can't transfer your prize, Nobel body says amid Machado's Trump suggestion
items.summary: The organisation that oversees the Nobel Peace Prize has thrown cold water on talk of the Venezuelan opposition leader giving her award to Donald Trump.

items.summary: Cost of living pressures mean both parents often need to work and there's one flexible arrangement that has become crucial to the functioning of households.
